ygData.subject: RE: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i guess it lies in what Verant thinks we are, which if it comes down to it, regardless of how we feel, is probably a hybrid.  and if the hybrids are capped
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> Pure caster and priest types definitely cap at 255 (in-game
> spouse is a 50
> cleric). Good question about the hybrids though.

i guess it lies in what Verant thinks we are, which if it comes down to it,
regardless of how we feel, is probably a hybrid. and if the hybrids are
capped at 200, we may be stuck there too (until expansion i guess).

>
> I TOTALLY disagree with our musical skills capping at 200. I
> mean I think
> i'm doing ok with 200, but a Bard's main skills are song.
> Without song we
> are basically a nerfed, useless version of every class
> (except our tracking
> being superior to druids MUAHAHAHA... j/k). Song defines us.
> Magic defines a
> wizard. Why the hell should they get 255 and not us?

this is how i have been feeling the more and more i think about it.


>
> WAKE UP VERANT!
> Where is the petition? I'd like to sign it...

not sure if it was this list or another onelist bards list. a
letter/petition of sorts was sent to GZ, after a month we get a response.
not all we wanted, but answers at least. i don't think we put skill caps in
the letter. but we all have gzatkin@... if we want to use it.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
